to understand this game you should play the first part oviuslly, and I recommendo u both parts because each one are one story, a story that is going to like you, touch you in a great way, and in some parts make you laugth.

This game is going to show you ethical values that are pretty hard to find in other game, or even a movie.

Sharp writing, witty humor, and puzzles that make you feel like a genius when you solve them.

The sequal to one of the funniest and mind blowingly different games came out and was exactly as good as you could have hoped. You already own this game, you know how good it is.

Que dire qui n'a pas encore été dit sur ce jeu ? Comme son prédécesseur, il a sa place dans le hall of fame des jeux vidéo.
J'y ait joué sur un PC portable Windows avec une carte graphique NVidia GT 630M et il a bien tourné avec les paramètres graphiques positionnés vers le haut.
Les voix anglaises originales ont ma péférence.
you smart? good. and you have smart brain? that is very good.

On my TOP 3 games of ALL FUCKING TIME!!!! THIS GAME IS AMAZING, LIKE EXPECTED FROM VALVE WE TOUGHT PORTAL 1 WAS A MASTER PIECE AND HERE THEY CAME AND RELEASED PORTAL 2.. New challenges, a painting system that help at puzzles, a captivating history with a friend that become a villian and a villian who became a "potatoed" friend! You like this game or you're WRONG!

Ett ofantligt och ofattbart roligt spel, ett pussel utan dess like och det enda vapnet du har att tillgå är en portalgun som du kan skjuta hål i väggar, golv eller tak med. Skjut ett hål på ett ställe och ett till hål på ett annat ställe. Kliv in genom ena hålet och kom ut igenom det andra hålet. Sen finns det hinder på vägen men det är det du har din portalgun till för att lösa problemen med.

Det och diverse geleer som dyker upp längre fram i spelet som hjälper dig att ta dig fram snabbare eller hoppa högre.

Bättre och roligare en så här kan nog ett spel aldrig bli. Skulle möjligen vara om Portal 3 kommer då :)
It's Approved!

This game is amazing. In my opinion, it has one of the best stories ever. Puzzles get harder and harder as you go on and there's nothing repetetive about it, because all the levels are so different and unique. There's also Co-Op, so you can play with your friends on other cool one-of-a-kind levels. I'd say this game is worth the full price, and maybe even pick up the Portal/Portal 2 bundle so you can try out the original.

[list]

[*]Super Charaktere

[*]Spaßigem Gameplay

INCRÍVEL!

My entry for the "Test of Time" category for the Steam Awards. Since it was first released, I've played this game once or twice a year. I never get tired of the story. I never get bored of the puzzles since they feel new every time (mainly because I have a terrible memory). Whenever I hear a friend of mine has yet to play this amazing game, I always jump at the oppurtunity to invite them over and have them play. I never thought I would always keep coming back to this game as much as I do, yet here we are.

Тебе скучно и одиноко? Ты хочешь динамику, различные игровые механики, головоломки? Тогда это точно твой выбор! Однажды у Гейба спросили "Гейб Ньюэлл, после Portal 2 вы не сделали игру лучше этой. Что вы ответите на это?", на что Глава Valve ответил "Ну так никто еще не сделал лучше Portal 2".
Portal 1 y 2 son muy bueno ;_; altamente recomendados

How to properly play Portal 2:

1: Download the game.
2: Open the game
3: Play the Campaign
4: Beat the Campaign
5: Make levels for the vast community
6: Close the game
7: Discard steps 1-6
8: Boot up the game, and if you first pirated the game from PirateBay or IGG-Games, nice try m8, I did that myself before, it doesn't come with multiplayer, ya twat.
9: Do not simply play the Campaign, nor simply get involved with the characters. Instead, calculate your surroundings, and the puzzles you come across.
10: Use science before AND after you recieve the portal gun
11: Forget about logic
12: Forget about physics
13: And most importantly, DO NOT--
14: Discard steps 1-13.
15: Continue testing.....

Amazing game. Never before has a game delivered a coop experience with so many possibilities for stabbing a friend in the back when they least expect it
Fun puzzles to solve, especially with a friend. Also very fun to "accidentally" kill your friend.
Best game ever !

Puzzle game with great story, compelling characters and fantastic dark humor.

But what's more entertaing than playing with a friend? Portal 2 offers that too, delivering the same quality as in single-player. 

But above all else it' a great puzzle game, difficulty curve is the best from all that i have ever seen. You will never feel lost for too long, or have to see a walkthroug, game is challenging but not impossible.

I highly recommend playing it.

Интересная одиночная кампания, крутой кооператив, отличный юмор и просто одна из лучших игр.

I don't normally write a review, but this game was truly amazing. 
Where do I start...
The game is challenging, and encourages players to think outside of the box. The physics in the game is very realistic and the story is interestingish. the story is a little more complicated then the last games story, but not edge of my seat kinda thing. The puzzles are just mind blowing and I like the new obstacles that weren't there in last game. It's also great that pretty much any pc can run this at 60 fps. I definetly recommend this game. 
P.S. It says I played three hours though more like 97 hours, it was because I was offline when playing.
One of the best coop game!)
